p: Data were grouped according to the food providing organ [seeds, fruit (all other fruit parts besides of the seeds) and leaves] and analyzed using ANOVA, Student-Newman-Keuls Test and Principal Component Analysis (PCA) based on correlation. No data transformation was applied, as data met the assumption of normality and homoscedasticity based on Ryan-Joiner test of normality and the Levene test for homogeneity of variances. All the analyses were performed using R statistical software ( R Core Team, 2013).
